item.title: Report X-2024120381
item.description:
Report X-2024120381

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-06T12:24:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-20
  • City: EUGENE
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: DISCOVERED PACKAGE IN THE DMP AREA. INSPECTED PACKAGE AND NOTICED FUEL RESIDUE, THEN CALLED HAZMAT HELP DESK FOR FURTHER INSTRUCTIONS. HAZMAT HELP DESK INSTRUCTED INPUT AS UNDECLARED. ENGINE, INTERNAL COMBUSTION, FLAMMABLE LIQUID POWERED - FUEL TANK IS FULL OF GASOLINE

item.title: Report X-2024120377
item.description:
Report X-2024120377

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-06T12:24:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-13
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: THE WET PACKAGE WAS FOUND IN THE INSIDE SOUTH INDUCT IN SMALLS AT 20:54 ON 11/13/24. AFTER OPENING THE PACKAGE IT WAS DETERMINED THAT THE BOX WAS ONLY EXTERNALLY AFFECTED BY A LIQUID. NONE OF THE PACKAGE CONTENTS WERE DAMAGED/LEAKING. HOWEVER, IT WAS DISCOVERED THAT THE PACKAGE CONTAINED AN AEROSOL CAN AND WAS NOT AFFIXED WITH ANY OUTWARD HAZARD COMMUNICATIONS. THE INCIDENT WAS REPORTED TO RMP AS A SUSPECTED UNDECLARED HAZMAT. PACKAGE WILL BE HELD FOR ADG COMPLIANCE.

item.title: Report X-2024120365
item.description:
Report X-2024120365

  • City: PORTLAND

  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: LEAKING PACKAGE DISCOVERED IN UNLOAD. RESPONDER CALLED. RESPONDER OPENED PACKAGE, DISCOVERED MULTIPLE POTENTIAL UNDECLARED HAZMATS. UPS UNDECLARED HAZMAT POLICY INITIATED. CONTAINED PAINT / PAINT RELATED MATERIAL / LITHIUM ION BATTERY PACKED WITH EQUIPMENT.

  • City: PORTLAND

  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PRODUCT UNDAMAGED, BUT WAS UNDECLARED AEROSOL CANS. THE INTERNAL BOX CONTAINING THESE CANS DID HAVE LIMITED QUANTITY PRINTED ON THE SIDE OF THE FOUR INTERNAL BOXES, BUT NO LIMITED QUANTITY ON THE OUTSIDE OR ANY OTHER INDICATIONS ON THE PACKAGE TO ALERT TO ITS CONTENTS.
